name: CrossCell
description:
Hi Gamers!

This is the first game i have made

Yep, no 2d platformers to start off with.

I jumped right into FPS

Uh, yeah, so the game is horrible but hey, i was  just testing some things out

Tell me what you think?

Should i continue with this project, polish the levels? Add more effects and interactions? What about actually setting up the multiplayer system idea i had in mind? I want this game to be built by you guys! So bi-monthly updates will be coming with only the best content provided from... YOU!

Currently only includes three horribly designed levels, a great soundtrack and UI system. ZERO Multiplayer/Level Editor features and amazing splash text.

Want to see what i implement? Go ahead and subscribe here...

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCBkADKDMl6G5pXbFyxLuTNw
